members.name: _bIsLawEnforcer
members.comment: Is this guy chasing the player at the moment

members.name: _bIsAmbulanceOnDuty
members.comment: Ambulance trying to get to an accident

members.name: _bIsFireTruckOnDuty
members.comment: Firetruck trying to get to a fire

members.name: _bIsLocked
members.comment: Is this guy locked by the script (cannot be removed)

members.name: _bEngineOn
members.comment: For sound purposes. Parked cars have their engines switched off (so do destroyed cars)

members.name: _bIsHandbrakeOn
members.comment: How's the handbrake doing ?

members.name: _bLightsOn
members.comment: Are the lights switched on ?

members.name: _bFreebies
members.comment: Any freebies left in this vehicle ?

members.name: _bIsVan
members.comment: Is this vehicle a van (doors at back of vehicle)

members.name: _bIsBus
members.comment: Is this vehicle a bus

members.name: _bIsBig
members.comment: Is this vehicle a big

members.name: _bLowVehicle
members.comment: Need this for sporty type cars to use low getting-in/out anims

members.name: _bComedyControls
members.comment: Will make the car hard to control (hopefully in a funny way)

members.name: _bWarnedPeds
members.comment: Has scan and warn peds of danger been processed?

members.name: _bCraneMessageDone
members.comment: A crane message has been printed for this car allready

members.name: _bExtendedRange
members.comment: This vehicle needs to be a bit further away to get deleted

members.name: _bTakeLessDamage
members.comment: This vehicle is stronger (takes about 1/4 of damage)

members.name: _bIsDamaged
members.comment: This vehicle has been damaged and is displaying all its components

members.name: _bHasBeenOwnedByPlayer
members.comment: To work out whether stealing it is a crime

members.name: _bFadeOut
members.comment: Fade vehicle out

members.name: _bCreateRoadBlockPeds
members.comment: If this vehicle gets close enough we will create peds (coppers or gang members) round it

members.name: _bCanBeDamaged
members.comment: Set to FALSE during cut scenes to avoid explosions

members.name: _bUsingSpecialColModel
members.comment: Is player vehicle using special collision model, stored in player strucure

members.name: _bOccupantsHaveBeenGenerated
members.comment: Is true if the occupants have already been generated. (Shouldn't happen again)

members.name: _bGunSwitchedOff
members.comment: Level designers can use this to switch off guns on boats

members.name: _bVehicleColProcessed
members.comment: Has ProcessEntityCollision been processed for this car?

members.name: _bIsCarParkVehicle
members.comment: Car has been created using the special CAR_PARK script command

members.name: _bHasAlreadyBeenRecorded
members.comment: Used for replays
